recipes.name: Crock Pot Roast
ingredients: 1 package dried Italian salad dressing mix
steps: Place beef roast in crock pot.
Mix the dried mixes together in a bowl and sprinkle over the roast.
Pour the water around the roast.
Cook on low for 7-9 hours.

recipes.name: Roasted Asparagus
steps: Preheat oven to 425Â°F.
Cut off the woody bottom part of the asparagus spears and discard.
With a vegetable peeler, peel off the skin on the bottom 2-3 inches of the spears.
Place asparagus on foil-lined baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil.
Sprinkle with salt.
With your hands, roll the asparagus around until they are evenly coated with oil and salt.
Roast for 10-15 minutes, depending on the thickness of your stalks and how tender you like them.
They should be tender when pierced with the tip of a knife.
The tips of the spears will get very brown but watch them to prevent burning.
They are great plain, but sometimes I serve them with a light vinaigrette if we need something acidic to balance out our meal.

recipes.name: Curried Lentils and Rice
steps: Bring broth to a low boil.
Add curry powder and salt.
Cook lentils for 20 minutes.
Add rice and simmer for 20 minutes.
Enjoy!

recipes.name: Big Night Pizza
steps: Add hot water to yeast in a large bowl and let sit for 15 minutes.
Mix in oil, sugar, salt, and flour and let sit for 1 hour.
Knead the dough and spread onto a pan.
Spread pizza sauce and sprinkle cheese.
Add any optional toppings as you wish.
Bake at 400 deg Fahrenheit for 15 minutes.
Enjoy!

recipes.name: Grilled Steak
steps: Marinate beef steak with barbecue sauce, garlic powder, and black pepper for 30 minutes.
Grill the steak over medium heat until desired doneness.
Let it rest for 5 minutes before slicing.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
steps: Cook penne pasta according to package instructions.
Season chicken breast with salt and pepper, then grill until cooked through.
Steam broccoli until tender-crisp.
In a saucepan, heat heavy cream and parmesan cheese until cheese is melted and sauce is smooth.
Slice chicken breast into strips.
Combine cooked pasta, broccoli, sliced chicken, and creamy sauce.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Honey Soy
steps: In a small bowl, mix together soy sauce, honey, minced garlic, and ginger.
Marinate salmon fillets in the mixture for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.name: Garlic Grilled Shrimp
steps: In a bowl, mix together olive oil, minced garlic, paprika, salt, and black pepper.
Add shrimp to the bowl and toss to coat evenly.
Thread shrimp onto skewers.
Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Grill shrimp for 2-3 minutes per side, or until pink and opaque.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.name: Grilled Soy Honey Sesame Chicken Thighs
steps: In a bowl, whisk together soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, and sesame oil.
Marinate chicken thighs in the mixture for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Grill chicken thighs for 6-7 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.name: Grilled Pork Chops
steps: In a bowl, whisk together balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, and minced garlic.
Marinate pork chops in the mixture for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Grill pork chops for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Serve hot and enjoy!
